nodes.text: The M2-AUX Foreman was a type of labor droid used by the Selkath species on the planet Manaan during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. At least two Foremans were employed at Genetics Laboratory G-1, a genetic research facility.

The M2-AUX Foreman appears as a NPC in the Tactical Flashpoint "Depths of Manaan," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.9: Galactic Strongholds Early Access. It appears as a friendly character at the start of the Flashpoint, at the surface docks of the facility, but Game Update 3.0: Shadow of Revan Early Access added a Hard Mode version of the Flashpoint that includes another, hostile M2-AUX Foreman within the facility as a bonus boss.
